Package org.jgentleframework.core.reflection

Interface Summary
DefinitionPostProcessor This interface represents a generic DefinitionPostProcessor.
FieldIdentification This interface represents the field identification, designates a field or a set of fields corresponding to declaring class and one regular expression of name.
IAnnotationVisitor Provides some method in order to manage extension points in course interpret annotations or definitions.
IAnnoVisitable The Interface IAnnoVisitable.
Identification<T> Represents an Identification instance.
MemberIdentification<T> The Interface MemberIdentification represents all common methods of an Identification Member.
MethodIdentification This interface represents the method identification, designates a method or a set of methods corresponding to declaring class and one regular expression of name.
SingleClassIdentification This interface represents the class identification, designate a Class or a set of Class that corresponds to one regular expression of name.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMember This class is an abstract class which represents a Member.
AbstractProgramUnit This class is an abstract class that is represented a ProgramUnit
AbstractVisitorHandler This class is responsible for annotation interpreter.
ReflectIdentification The Reflect class is an abstract class representing some of static methods designating to be used conjointly with ObjectBindingConstant in order to perform annotating operations.
 

Exception Summary
AnnotationBeanException The Class AnnotationBeanException.
DefinitionPostException The Class DefinitionPostException.
ReflectException The Class ReflectException.
